name: GDKO Generator
description:
Welcome to the future of Game Development.

Building upon technology pioneered by The Vandervas Generator, get ready to embark on the AI generative deep-learning experience of your lifetime.

The GDKO Generator has studied a plethora of 100+ interactive experiences created over the past months and is now able to generate games of any genre, length, kind of story and/or level of customization that you could possibly imagine.

Made for the final round of GDKO
